data.actual_result: You must restart the app to see the new Playing status of the user. Note that this didn't occur on Alpha 5.8.3 and older versions
data.expected_result: The Playing status should update immediately in member list
data.short_description: As of Alpha 5.8.4, Playing status of others won't auto-update
data.steps_to_repro: - Have someone set a Playing status - Open your Android app - Open Member list and look at the Playing status - Ask the user to change it
